00025 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( ParameterNameValuePairTest );

00039 void ParameterNameValuePairTest::test_assignment()
00040 {
00041         ParameterNameValuePair param1;
00042         ParameterNameValuePair param2;
00043         wstring name = L"name";
00044         wstring value = L"value";
00045 
00046         param1.Name = name;
00047         param1.Value = value;
00048 
00049         param2 = param1;
00050 
00051         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param2.Name == param1.Name );
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param2.Value == param1.Value );
00053 }
00054 
00055 void ParameterNameValuePairTest::test_equality_to_other_object()
00056 {
00057         ParameterNameValuePair param1;
00058         ParameterNameValuePair param2;
00059         wstring name = L"name";
00060         wstring value = L"value";
00061 
00062         param1.Name = name;
00063         param1.Value = value;
00064 
00065         param2.Name = name;
00066         param2.Value = value;
00067 
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param2 == param1 );
00069 }
00070 
00071 void ParameterNameValuePairTest::test_equality_to_string()
00072 {
00073         ParameterNameValuePair param;
00074         wstring name = L"name";
00075         wstring value = L"value";
00076 
00077         param.Name = name;
00078         param.Value = value;
00079 
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param == name );
00081 }
00082 
00083 void ParameterNameValuePairTest::test_accessibility()
00084 {
00085         ParameterNameValuePair param;
00086         wstring name = L"name";
00087         wstring value = L"value";
00088 
00089         param.Name = name;
00090         param.Value = value;
00091 
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param.Name == name );
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param.Value == value );
00094 }
